/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a vibrant urban landscape. People can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, adding a dynamic element to the scene. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, indicating a well-organized traffic system. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day.
